vilij.components

Interface UIComponent

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AppUI, UITemplate

    public interface UIComponent
    This interface defines the minimal functionality of the graphical user interface of a Vilij application.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void clear()
      Method to clear any existing visualization on the graphical user interface front-end.
      javafx.scene.Scene getPrimaryScene()
      Accessor method to get the scene graph of the application's main window.
      javafx.stage.Stage getPrimaryWindow()
      Accessor method to get the application's window, which is the primary stage within which the full application GUI is placed.
      java.lang.String getTitle() 
      void initialize()
      Method to enforce the initialization of the user interface styles for any Vilij application.

    • Method Detail

      • getPrimaryWindow

        javafx.stage.Stage getPrimaryWindow()
        Accessor method to get the application's window, which is the primary stage within which the full application GUI is placed.
        Returns:
        the application's primary stage

      • getPrimaryScene

        javafx.scene.Scene getPrimaryScene()
        Accessor method to get the scene graph of the application's main window.
        Returns:
        the application's scene graph

      • getTitle

        java.lang.String getTitle()
        Returns:
        the application title

      • initialize

        void initialize()
        Method to enforce the initialization of the user interface styles for any Vilij application.

      • clear

        void clear()
        Method to clear any existing visualization on the graphical user interface front-end.
